product_name: Lost Horizons Tsering Earflap Hat - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: The Lost Horizons Tsering earflap hat, handcrafted in Nepal, features a colorful design that goes well with any cold-weather outfit. Wool is a natural insulator: warm, soft and breathable to keep you comfortable in the great outdoors. Polyester fleece lining wicks moisture and is soft next to skin; earflap design keeps your entire head warm. Dry clean or hand wash in cold water; lay flat to dry. Special buy.
